name: Kunwu's Iris Rift
r1: Increases Normal Attack SPD by 10%. Increases DMG against enemies affected by any element by 24%.
r2: Increases Normal Attack SPD by 12%. Increases DMG against enemies affected by any element by 30%.
r3: Increases Normal Attack SPD by 14%. Increases DMG against enemies affected by any element by 36%.
r4: Increases Normal Attack SPD by 16%. Increases DMG against enemies affected by any element by 42%.
r5: Increases Normal Attack SPD by 18%. Increases DMG against enemies affected by any element by 48%.
